mapper.sql: actid, picpath, begintime, endtime, rule, award, adescript, maxinter, allinter, ispass, isdelete, a_audit, creattime, updatetime, filed1, filed2
mapper.select:
select count(*) from dd_activity where
creattime like #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
isdelete = 1

select * from dd_activity where
creattime like #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
isdelete=1 order by creattime desc
limit #{num1},#{num2}
select actid, picpath, begintime, endtime, rule, award, adescript, maxinter, allinter from dd_activity where isdelete=1 and ispass=1 order by creattime limit 0,1

select actid, picpath, begintime, endtime, rule, award, adescript, maxinter, allinter from dd_activity where isdelete=1 and ispass=1 order by creattime
limit 0,1

mapper.update:
update dd_activity
picpath = #{picpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award = #{award,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where actid = #{actid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dd_activity set picpath = #{picpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award = #{award,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adescript = #{adescript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maxinter = #{maxinter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allinter = #{allinter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ispass = #{ispass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, a_audit = #{a_audit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creattime = #{creattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=INTEGER} where actid = #{actid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select actid,picpath from dd_activity where ispass = 1 and isdelete != 1
